title: Textile, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: mordant dyed and painted (chintz) on plain weave foundation
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 39 x 38.1 cm (15 3/8 x 15 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 17.1 x 40 cm (6 3/4 x 15 3/4 in.)
description: Exotic flowers with trailing blossoms and leaves in vivid shades of purple, blue, green, yellow, and reds with black outlining on a white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1750–1800.
1750–1800. Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: mordant dyed and painted (chintz) on plain weave foundation. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-83-a,b.
